Recommendations: It is highly recommended that faculty counterparts should attach only pertinent supporting documents in order to have comprehensive and well packaged documentation. All activities of the college should be documented from planning up to implementation stage.
Students should not be neglected in the policy planning activity of the Institution and of the college specifically on policies that will directly affect them.
Filing of documents ln the Record Management Office should be more organized and systematic so that documents can easily be found and retrieved when needed.

To maintain the standard of the institution specific guidelines and policies be strictly observed and implemented. Regular assessment and review regarding the extent of its implementation should be done.
If budget allows, it is recommended that the college be provided with full time laboratory custodian/technician who will manage and maintain equipment.
Short and long term development plan should be monitored and evaluated.
Different social activities may be done regularly to strengthen the harmonious working relationship of the MMSU family.
The college must be provided with specifi budget allocation for its operation.
Faculty's honoraria pay for the excess teaching load may be included in the budget proposals so that this can be released on time.
